note.p: The base text from AM 601 b 4to, held at Stofnun Árna Magnússonar í íslenskum fræðum in Reykjavík.
This is a digital edition of the seventeenth century saga of Hrómundur (Hrómundar saga Greipssonar). It is based on the text preserved in AM 601 b 4to with variants from the seven oldest manuscripts.
The edition was prepared by Katarzyna Anna Kapitan.
